Class Reservation

    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(int resId,
                   User guest,
                   Hotel hotel,
                   MyDate checkIn,
                   MyDate checkOut,
                   int sRn,
                   int dRn,
                   int tRn,
                   int apN)
        Nine arguments constructor
        Parameters:
        resId - reservation id
        guest - the user that makes the reservation
        hotel - the hotel in were the reservation is made
        checkIn - the date that the guest checks in
        checkOut - the date that the guest checks out
        sRn - single rooms number
        dRn - double rooms number
        tRn - triple rooms number
        apN - apartments number
